title: Propellerhead Reason Music Collection 6 with Auto Refill for Rea
description:
This torrent is completely legal. It contains many Reason 4 or later files which can be used by any Reason musician to produce music. Songs are self contained. That is why it is called auto refill. Some songs therefore are around 28 MegaBytes.

RNS files can be loaded straight into your Reason Sequencer. MP3 is just for people without Sequencer.

Because of legacy Yamaha XG Synthesizers are supported too.

Release 004 will be supported until April 1th 2016.

This is Release 006, it now includes to many additional songs to simply update from the website.

It has been verified to work on Propellerhead Reason 5 despite everything is created with Reason 4 ( and even Reason 2 )

When downloading with a Torrent client you should copy files you want to use or change to another directory. If you open a file inside the Torrent download directory with Reason Sequencer and save it you will not be able to continue downloading.


Seeding is welcome.

A backup is always needed if you would want to revert any changes so after a first backup a working directory for your projects is recommended to use instead of the original backup of the downloaded Torrent data.

Examples in MP3 and to download into your Sequencer:

Verocha: 
http://reasonstation.nl/downloads/reason/mp3-reason/053-2010-01-29-Carte-Blanche-127v04.mp3
 
http://reasonstation.nl/downloads/reason/mp3-reason/053-2010-01-29-Carte-Blanche-127v04.rns

Kim Wilde: ( Updated see production date 2016-01-17 )

Note:
Every song starts with a number, production date and version. 

Next release will contain additional songs so check back once and a while
